item.title: More pirate!
item.description:
::::: entry-content

Reading The Pirate’s Dilemma thanks to a chance encounter with the most excellent pirate Matt Mason{.zem_slink rel=“homepage”} himself got me thinking. What jumped out was a rawness – not in an aggressive way – but in natural, passionate sense. It’s the very rawness that we try and institutionalize out of our society. The very rawness that actually creates the conditions for our greatest leaps… leapfrogging incrementalism… right into a different future.
